name: Founding Years / Klay Schools
description: At KLAY, we go the extra mile, surpassing the conventional daycare and preschool experience. Our passionate team, state-of-the-art facilities, stringent health and safety protocols and thoughtfully designed learning approach combine to provide a safe, secure and enriching place for your child. Join us at KLAY, where together we'll nurture your little one’s holistic growth and development.

enhanced_description: Founding Years / Klay Schools operates as India's largest network of non-franchised Child Development and Care Centres. As India’s leading chain, KLAY provides top-notch learning and care for children, supporting over 60,000 families. The service surpasses conventional daycare and preschool experiences through its passionate team, state-of-the-art facilities, and a thoughtfully designed learning approach. Emphasizing stringent health and safety protocols, KLAY aims to provide a safe, secure, and enriching environment dedicated to nurturing a child’s holistic growth and development. KLAY is trusted by corporates to offer essential support to their employees.
